entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
